entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • High native memory usage during CRL check for the server not featuring OCSP stapling #108557
  • [cdac] .NET10: Implement DAC APIs used by CLRMA #108553
    10.0.0
  • [HttpStress] [SslStress] Not possbile to run locally with docker #108551
  • Cannot step over Debugger.Break() in m3 lldb #108541
  • ILC: Add property for target processor tuning #108540

Closed

  • Bug with Debug/Release mode witch use Regex.Matches #108556
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'tree == stmt->GetRootNode()' #108406
    9.0.0
  • System.IO.Ports.Native termios c_iflag settings ignored? #108404
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0] linux/arm64: Verify TLS resolver code #108564
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix IndexOf Optimization Code #108563
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Globalization, 8.0.x
  • [release/9.0] Fix IndexOf Optimization Code #108562
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Globalization, 9.0.0
  • Enable for PAC while compiling coreclr (not the jitted code) #108561
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Fix macOS arm64 Unix breakpoint #108560
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • use SpecialFolder.UserProfile instead of USERPROFILE #108559
    area-DependencyModel, community-contribution
  • Use the managed implementation of extendedKeyUsage codec everywhere #108558
    area-System.Security
  • Update fuzzing infra to build and use the shared framework #108555
    area-Meta
  • Investigate SwiftSelf<T> CI error #108554
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Interop-coreclr
  • ILLink: Don't mark attributes from MarkEntireType #108552
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/9.0] JIT: Null out SSA def nodes upon removal in RBO #108548
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Switch `SwiftSelf<T>` position requirement to last #108547
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [mono] [Swift interop] Fix InlineArray lowering with static fields #108546
    os-mac-os-x, os-ios, os-tvos, area-Interop-mono
  • [wasm] Fixes for issue #108519 #108543
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Mark or set encoding param in StreamReader ctor to be nullable #108542
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix getting default install location for x64 when running x86 host on x64 Windows #108538
    area-Host

Merged

  • linux/arm64: Verify TLS resolver code #108419
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix IndexOf Optimization Code #108499
    area-System.Globalization
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix wrong Region Info Names #108550
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Globalization, 8.0.x
  • [cdac] Tighten cdac_data friend declarations #108525
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Use the managed implementation for keyUsage encoding and decoding everywhere #108549
    area-System.Security, 10.0.0
  • Remove OverflowException for ReadCborNegativeIntegerRepresentation #108398
    area-System.Formats.Cbor
  • [release/9.0][PERF] Backport python pipeline changes for performance tests #108412
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • ILLink: Avoid warning for RUC field rooted as part of a root assembly #108498
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix ILLink behavior for modreq types #108494
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Trim analyzer: fix member reported for generic warning #108528
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Null out SSA def nodes upon removal in RBO #108530
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Improve codegen around unsigned comparisons #105593
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Fix flag assignment in pal_termios #108409
    community-contribution, area-System.IO.Ports
  • Add build-time check for unwind proc_info_in_range #108250
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Simplify IsComObjectType checks #108487
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Improve software exception handling performance #108480
    tenet-performance, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Networking stress tests infrastructure improvements. #108325
    area-System.Net
  • Fix differences between bash and cmd versions of crossgen test script #108500
    area-crossgen2-coreclr

Updated

  • [release/9.0] Update the component resources for the VS descriptions #108304
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, area-Workloads
  • Fix an issue with the last level cache values on Linux running on certain AMD Processors #108492
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2553022 #107711
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove HelperMethodFrames (HMF) from Reflection code paths #108535
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Allow un-examining in PipeReader.AdvanceTo(...) #107360
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • [cdac] Implement NibbleMap lookup and tests #108403
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add managed Mac signing implementation #107378
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Use a more exact base class for considerGuardedDevirtualization #108497
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • JIT: run a late pass of empty try/finally/fault removal #108003
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0][no-merge][testing][infra] Try Apple mobile platforms on iOS 18 and XCode 16 #107021
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, os-tvos
  • [release/9.0] Fix IL2104 link #108533
    Servicing-consider, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 9.0.0
  • Add experimental Swift bindings for CryptoKit #108318
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Security, cryptographic-docs-impact, 10.0.0
  • [mono] Fix vector class retrieval and type checks for binary operand APIs #107388
    arch-arm64, area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono, 10.0.0
  • Add trim annotations to System.Configuration.ConfigurationManager #108464
    area-System.Configuration
  • Avoid Blocking Finalizer Thread During Shutdown in SystemEvents #108489
    area-Microsoft.Win32
  • JIT: Use linear block order for MinOpts in LSRA #108147
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Update `field` references in property accessors #108222
    area-Meta
  • Use architecture independent code paths in Array #108449
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Rewrite GetIndexOfFirstNonAsciiByte #104503
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Share pthread_setname via minipal #108370
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Add loop-aware RPO, and use as LSRA's block sequence #108086
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Wasm] feat: Make boot json file configurable #108281
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Remove static monitor helper functions #107667
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix Int32 to Unsigned overflow check #107024
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [wasm] Read messages from binlog if process output is missing build finished message #107280
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: Enable range-based for over ABI passing segments #107174
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use live apphost when publishing ilc as singlefile #105004
    os-freebsd, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Extend escape analysis to account for arrays with non-gcref elements #104906
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Use edge weights in `LinearScan::findPredBlockForLiveIn` #108493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Transfer arguments between calling conventions in shuffling thunks #107282
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Remove string.Trim{,Start,End}(ReadOnlySpan<char>) #108537
    new-api-needs-documentation, needs-area-label

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Expand platform/architecture coverage for tests running in PR builds #43916
    9.0.2xx
  • 'AddImplicitDefineConstants' runs too late, and defines are missing when 'XamlPreCompile' runs, causing build failures #43908
  • Improve preview handling for `dotnet workload search version` #43890

Closed

  • Attempting to build on Ubuntu Docker Container -- SMB Share Nuget Cache -- Results in access denied for single package #43917
  • When trying to install dotnet-ef tool, we get error saying that dotnet-ef is not a .NET tool #43844

PullRequests

Created

  • Update the table for 9.0.2xx and 10.0.1xx #43918
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.4xx] Allow reading of OCI Image Indexes to determine RID-specific base image for multi-architecture images #43914
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Allow reading of OCI Image Indexes to determine RID-specific base image for multi-architecture images #43913
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #43909
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Update Windows SDK projection versions #43889
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2549754 #43514
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #43843
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] make error for workload info clean Fixes #42581 #43587
    untriaged, Area-Workloads, 9.0.2xx
  • [DO NOT MERGE] Restore ability for users to consume the containers package easily #43794
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
  • Allow reading of OCI Image Indexes to determine RID-specific base image for multi-architecture images #43631
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Update branding to 6.0.136 #43820
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix WriteSize() and WriteString() methods #43900
    Area-DotNet Test
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Update CODEOWNERS #43906
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update CODEOWNERS #43885
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix for source-build stage 2 compiler errors #43879
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Delete old crossgen conditions #43840
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Read RunSettingsFilePath property and send as env var in dotnet test #43868
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Fix writing dotnet test results when terminal logger is off #43871
    Area-DotNet Test
  • Revert "Clean up error experience when downloading non-tools (#43045)" #43872
    Servicing-approved

Updated

  • [release/8.0.4xx] Add Dev Device ID #43362
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.3xx] Add Dev Device ID #43360
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Add Dev Device ID #43357
    Servicing-consider, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add missing conditions for illumos #43775
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge the net10 runtime, aspnetcore, windowsdesktop, and arcade codeflows #43070
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix extension comparison #43877
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Introduce a join point for SdkLocator and VSTemplateLocator #43723
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix baseline manifest version for RTM branding #43737
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Implement support for Aspire #43884
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-04
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Re-rename to Roles and Extensions #8431
  • Extension lowering #7771
  • [Proposal]: Open generic types in `nameof` #8480
  • Switching ReadOnlySpan<char> with constant strings #1881
    11.0
  • [Proposal]: `readonly` parameters #8478

PullRequests

Created

  • Update simple-lambda-parameters-with-modifiers.md #8487

Merged

  • Update README.md #8488
  • Update proposal for simple lambda parameters with modifiers #8485

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NuGet-installed diagnostic suppressors should be able to suppress VSIX-installed analyzer diagnostics #75399
  • Field-backed properties: support `field` references in speculative `SemanticModel` #75398
    17.13
  • "New Line" options are not taking effect in VS 2022 Community (Version 17.12.0 Preview 1.0) #75393
    17.12 P3
  • Add GeneratedFilesOutputDirectory to Solution APIs #75389
  • [New API] IsIterator field on DeclarationModifiers type #75388
  • Make GeneratorDriverOptions.BaseDirectory public #75387

Closed

  • Add keyboard shortcut for "Add null checks" in Generate Constructor refactor #75320
  • Assert fails with collection expression of bools #75343
    17.13
  • How can i create a executable file (.exe) from simple app.cs program #75381
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35403.70 #75378
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35403.156 #75377

PullRequests

Created

  • Reduce allocations in TypeSymbolExtensions.IsAtLeastAsVisibleAs #75401
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • WIP: Support modifiers with simple lambda parameters. #75400
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.12 to main #75397
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to release/dev17.12 #75396
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #75395
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Remove !! parsing logic from the parser #75394
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update instructions for adding new `ErrorCode.WRN_` #75386
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add a WorkspaceKind property to ProjectContext. #75384
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Merged

  • Add keyboard shortcut for 'Add null checks' in generate constructor #75370
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • Revert "Merge release/dev17.12 to main" #75391
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Revert "Merge release/dev17.11 to release/dev17.12" #75390
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Revert "Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11" #75392
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Revert "Merge release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.10" #75376
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.12 to main #75385
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Visit collection expression elements as r-values in NullableWalker #75365
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Merge `main` into `features/FirstClassSpan` #75077
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Needs API Review, VSCode, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to release/dev17.12 #75382
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.12 to main #75383
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #75379
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.11 to release/dev17.12 #75380
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Convert more lambda rude edits to runtime rude edits #75285
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.12 to main #75346
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, VSCode, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #75375
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.10 #75374
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Fix circularity issue with binding const local #75371
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Implement lambda params with modifiers without type name #69273
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, Backlog
  • Mark ISourceGenerator as obsolete for implementation #75223
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Track GeneratedFilesOutputDirectory in the IDE #75311
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, Interactive-EnC, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged, New Language Feature - File-Local Types, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Fixing the OOM in scripting #75372
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, VSCode
  • Fix suggestions for dotted constant patterns in Color Color case #75373
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Report error for native PDB limit #75293
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Only provide fallback options for host analyzers #75317
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Improve doc comments for `IConditionalOperation.IsRef` #75288
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Change commit to async when enter is pressed #75335
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Verify that semantic snippets obey IDE preferences #75073
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Avoid unnecessary tail increment in collection expressions codegen #74982
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.13
  • Do not use overload resolution while lowering interpolated strings #75341
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix assignment analysis of ref fields #75340
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Blazor] - Issue calling `submitRequest` on data-enhanced form #58244
  • Quarantine `ThreadingAppTest.CounterPageCanUseThreads` #58242
  • [Blazor] Support for direct using generic parameters as components at Razor pages #58241
  • OpenApi Should support OpenAPI 3.1 AND thus OneOf for Enums AND Generics. #58239
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #58236
  • Large File Upload Issue (still) with MultipartReader in ASP.NET Core -8+ #58233

Closed

  • Removing unsafe code #56534
    10.0-preview1
  • EphemeralDataProtectionProvider isn't used by XmlKeyManager #54234
  • Data Protection Key Generation Race #52678
    .NET 10 Planning
  • DataProtection - PersistKeysToFileSystem is not working properly inside K3S with shared file system #51165
    .NET 9 Planning
  • IKeyManager / XmlKeyManager - Fail intermittently in load balanced scenarios #50440
    .NET 9 Planning
  • ProtectedBrowserStorage throws CryptographicException occasionally when using PersistKeysToAzureBlobStorage and ProtectKeysWithAzureKeyVault #48848
    .NET 9 Planning
  • DataProtection - Wrong activation time #33071
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Data Protection Refresh causing site hang #30752
    Backlog
  • Allow customization of the DataProtection PersistKeysToDbContext key ring store #26786
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Auto generate data protection keys and persist to redis #22554
    Backlog
  • AddDataProtection race condition #3514
    Backlog
  • Update on 50317 #58237
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #58215
  • Cannot use Microsoft.Extensions.ApiDescription.Server when using "WebApplication.Urls" #57255
  • Quarantine FormWithParentBindingContextTest.CanBindToFormWithFiles #54447
    9.0-rc2
  • Quarantine `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.E2ETest.Tests.ThreadingAppTest.IsStarted`, and `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.E2ETest.Tests.ThreadingAppTest.HasHeading` #54754
    9.0-rc2
  • .NET 8 Blazor - Navigation - AuthenticationStateProvider Bug #58009
  • VS 17.11 - Blazor Unhandled Exceptions - TypeError: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading 'push') #57993
  • Blazor WASM app : impossible to update index.html in debug #58047
  • Setting PathBase breaks Browserlink #58046
  • 404 Errors for all assets in Test Server – Unable to load assets and check UI tests #58072
  • Blazor JS interop (server side render). Calling InvokeJsAsync does not throw if connection lost #58089

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix handling for ambient route parameters #58246
    area-web-frameworks
  • [Blazor] Fix template nav menu styling #58245
    area-blazor
  • [s390x] Fix Extensions.ApiDescription.Client tests on s390x #58235
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution

Merged

  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `6dae7eb` to `a1e255a` #58240
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • Removing unsafe code in BufferExtensions #57417
    community-contribution, area-networking, 10.0-preview1
  • Quarantine `ThreadingAppTest.CounterPageCanUseThreads` #58243
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • Unquarantine fixed tests that have not failed in 30 days #57978
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Fix Prefix Matching Logic in PrefixContainer #58068
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 10.0-preview1
  • Add additional ProblemDetails default types and titles #58101
    community-contribution, area-minimal
  • throw an exception on id.get if session is not available #57902
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • [OutputCaching] OutputCacheOptions.ApplicationServices is always null during initialization #55847
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware
  • Use ImpersonationToken for IIS Windows Auth #58041
    feature-iis, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Date only and time only is not supported in blazor change detection for parameters #55914
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Ensuring cancellation of tokens when using GetLinkedCancellationToken(a,b) #55968
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Descriptive Error for Improper Use of [AsParameters] #56114 #58218
    community-contribution, area-minimal
  • Add public method to QuickGrid to close column options UI #57904
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 10.0-preview1

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [iOS, Testing] Setup a lane of UI tests that's able to run just CV tests with the CV Handler vs the CV2 handler #25097
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • Update Blazor Hybrid templates to latest Blazor Web template contents #25095
    .NET 9 Planning
  • [iOS] TintColor on UIButton image no longer working when button made visible #25093
  • OnAppearing of Page called again, although this page was on already replaced NavigationStack #25089
  • Memory leak in .Net 8 using Entity Framework and Sqllite #25087
  • The flyout icon and background appear awkward when enabled alongside a TitleBar. #25081
    Backlog
  • Scrolling Performance is slow in Android and iOS. #25080
  • [BUG] Memory Leak using SkiaBitmapExportContext #25079

Closed

  • How can I customize the appearance of top tabs (ShellSection) in MAUI for ios #25090
  • Title #25088
  • XamlC XC0045 on Reference Bindings pointed to XAML #23711
    9.0-rc2
  • iOS Crashes when debug into iPhone Emulator. #24974
  • IImage does not take into account photo Orientation, causing IImage height and width to get mixed up #23391

PullRequests

Created

  • [iOS] Put the UIScrollView into a UIView in a border handler #25098
    community ✨
  • Debug slow controls device tests #25096
    do-not-merge
  • Move TitleViewSetOnShellWorksAfterNavigation to Appium #25094
  • Try build arcade net9 #25085
  • Fixed Button doesn't reset to "Normal" if scrolled quickly to the top in IOS #25084
    community ✨
  • [XC] Report XC0025 as an error only in strict compilation mode #25082

Merged

  • [net9.0] Move to rtm #25017
  • Disable Warnings for RegisterGraphicsFont #25092
  • [net9.0] Fix CV2 handler and uitests fixes #25076
    area-testing
  • [tests] CV 2 devicetests #25078
    area-testing
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #25083
  • Update latest stuff of arcade #25086
  • [UITest] Remove the bottom section of iOS UITest #24586
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-testing
  • [release/8.0.1xx-sr9] [X] allow namescope resolution before parenting #25075
    .NET 8 SR9.2

Updated

  • Bump WinAppSDK to 1.6 #24266
    area-infrastructure
  • Add Device logs to Integration Tests #24268
    area-testing, .NET 9.0 GA
  • IndicatorView with DataTemplate - improvements #24776
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-activityindicator
  • [iOS] Fix Editor control does not scroll properly on iOS when enclosed in a Border control. #24683
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • [Android] SearchHandler - added focus/unfocus support #24852
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨, area-controls-searchbar, .NET 9 SR1
  • [Android] Fix app crash caused by dynamic template switching in ListView #24808
    community ✨
  • Stepper doesn't change increment value when being bound to a double in MVVM context (Windows) #24396
    community ✨, area-controls-stepper
  • Fix for unable to select a tab after backing out of a page and returning. #25011
    platform/windows 🪟, area-navigation, community ✨
  • Fix for Windows SearchBar MaxLength > 0 not working properly. #24919
    community ✨
  • NullReferenceException throws on Windows when setting Cookies on .NET MAUI WebView #24846
    community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • Fix DatePicker slow first render (#24929) #24948
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨
  • [android] Fallback to default icons in SearchHandler #25067
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • WIP: HybridWebView: Invoke .NET methods from JavaScript #25077
    area-controls-hybridwebview
  • Re-enable tests #24912
    area-testing
  • Fix [Android] Image AspectFill is not honored #25072
    platform/android 🤖, area-image, community ✨
  • Fix Text entry border disappear when changing to/from dark mode in Android #24433
    community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • Fixed NavigationPage TitleBar visibility issue when set to the parent page #25000
    area-navigation, community ✨, area-controls-titlebar
  • Fixed Microsoft.Maui.Controls 8.0.90 (Latest stable) Ruins Entry Controls #25006
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • CollectionView Header/Footer/EmptyView issues when adding/removing items. #24830
    community ✨
  • Improve TextToSpeech function by adding a speech rate parameter #24798
    community ✨
  • Fix TabBar visibility when navigating back from a non-tabbed page to a tabbed page #25004
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [net9.0] Fix deprecated API usage for embedded fonts on iOS/Catalyst 18.0+ #25055
  • [Windows] - Picker on windows shows "Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Picker" if ItemsSource has an empty string #24276
    community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • Fixed Shell Tab is still visible after set Tab.IsVisible to false #24999
    area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • BarBackground with Brush in NavigationPage on theme change #24429
    area-navigation, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/android
  • Fix Switch view has inconsistent colors when "off" #25068
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [Android] - Fixed Flickering Issue When Toggling WebView Visibility #24753
    area-layout, community ✨, area-controls-webview
  • Compressed layout is back (maybe?) #24758
    area-layout, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • Source Generation for XAML #24865
    area-xaml
  • [Android] Fix Flickering issue when calling Navigation.PopAsync #24887
    community ✨
  • Fix and verify shadow / shape / clip #24941
    community ✨, .NET 8 SR9.2
  • [Android] Fix scroll bar visibility set to Always not consistant #24901
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-scrollview
  • [Improvement] Add ReturnType API for SearchBar #24906
    t/enhancement ☀️, community ✨, area-controls-searchbar
  • Adding tests (disabled) from Control Gallery to Appium #24944
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • [Android] Tabs briefly display wrong background color when navigating between flyout items #24965
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • CollectionView, the footer moves to the bottom of the page when the empty view or empty view template is enabled #24997
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [Android] Custom back button image color #24993
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨, area-controls-titlebar
  • Fixed Size not calculated properly when invoking UseMauiCompatibility method in MauiProgram #25003
    platform/windows 🪟, area-layout, community ✨
  • [Winodws] Fixed TextCell Command executes only once #25066
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-listview

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Migrations: creating memory optimized table throws warning as error when applying migration because it can't be executed in a transaction #34829
    9.0.0
  • [dnceng-bot] Branch `efcore/release/8.0` can't be merged to Azdo internal branch #34827

Closed

  • ComplexProperty column name mapping ignored when loading via FromSql() #34818
  • How to use System.Transactions with SqlRetryingExecutionStrategy? #34825
  • Allow to configure a property type for annotation-only global facets #34824
  • EF Core 8.0 fails choosing the right constructor when creating entities from DB having multiple constructors #34783

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/9.0] Don't throw on non-transactional migration operation warning. #34830
    Servicing-consider
  • Merge branch 'release/8.0' into release/9.0 #34828

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Update dependencies #34821
    Servicing-approved
  • [release/8.0] Update dependencies #34822
    Servicing-approved
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/9.0' #34808

Updated

  • Keep parameter values out IMemoryCache in RelationalCommandCache #34803
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'main' #34770

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-04
entry.content:
PullRequests

  • Update CentOS version -- release/8.0.1xx #19999
